dict.string: Enables or disables all features of this tweak
Whether to disable auto-unlock and magic passcode when SOS mode is invoked (by pressing 5 times the lock button, which by default also disables Touch ID)
Replaces title in passcode view with the last time the device was unlocked
Applies to last time unlocked and magic passcode
Bypasses the passcode lock when the device was unlocked within a certain period
Bypasses the passcode lock within a certain period when connected to specific Wi-Fi networks (prior to locking)
Bypasses the passcode lock when headphones are connected (prior to locking)
Skip the lockscreen when auto-unlocking if no notifications are showing
Even when media controls are showing
Skip the lockscreen when auto-unlocking even if the media control are showing

Gives the ability to unlock the device with a secondary passcode. If unlocked with this code, the auto-unlock feature will temporarily be disabled.
cell PSGroupCell label Digits configuration footerText Use values from different sources: time, date, battery, timeout, or custom digits footerAlignment 0
cell PSGroupCell label Battery Remaining footerText Current battery percentage (00 for 100%) footerAlignment 0
cell PSGroupCell label Battery Used footerText 100 - current percentage, (for example 32 if battery is at 68%) footerAlignment 0
cell PSGroupCell label Timeout footerText This will make the device lock again after the time specified by the passcode digits, where the first digit is in minutes and the second one is in tens of seconds (for example 12 will lock the device again after 1 minute and 20 seconds) footerAlignment 0
cell PSGroupCell label Reverse footerText Swap the digit pair, on all options footerAlignment 0
cell PSGroupCell label Reset footerText Resets all options to default footerAlignment 0
